title: Ticket #849: HDFS is not in default DC_DAEMON_LIST
description: HDFS is not in the default DC_DAEMON_LIST. Shouldn't it be?
remarks:
2010-Aug-23 17:07:50 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070402 to v070404 using ./ticket_target_mover.

2010-Oct-07 00:53:23 by ilikhan:
Available in v7.4.4 and later

2011-Dec-05 13:37:01 by danb:
As of 7.6.4, HDFS is still not in DC_DAEMON_LIST by default. It appears that it never was. Perhaps the patch for this problem was never checked in?

2012-Feb-20 13:18:05 by danb:
Strangely, [28578] and [28579] are not showing up in this ticket, even though they contain the usual decoration indicating which ticket they belong to.

2012-Feb-27 14:37:49 by adesmet:
Looks reasonable to me. Closing.
check_ins:
2011-Dec-05 13:42   Check-in [28579]: Documented addition of HDFS to DC_DAEMON_LIST. ===GT=== #849 ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By Dan Bradley )
2011-Dec-05 13:39   Check-in [28578]: Added HDFS to default DC_DAEMON_LIST. #849 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
